content.rendered:
Directed by Matt Ross.

Written by Uzoamaka Maduka. Uzoamaka Maduka. Robbie Pickering. Robbie Pickering. Amelia Gray. Anayat Fakhraie. Sofya Levitsky-Weitz. Alberto RoldÃ¡n.

Cast Sean Penn (John Mitchell). Dan Stevens (John Dean). Betty Gilpin (Mo Dean). Shea Whigham (G. Gordon Liddy). Darby Camp (Marty Mitchell). Hamish Linklater (Jeb Magruder). Allison Tolman (Winnie McLendon). Chris Bauer (James McCord). J.C. MacKenzie (Howard Hunt). Martha Kelly (Rose Mary Woods). Nat Faxon (Bob Haldeman). John Carroll Lynch (L. Patrick Gray). Chris Messina (Angelo Lano). Carlos Valdes (Paul Magallanes). Anne Dudek (Diana Oweiss). Jordi Caballero (Eugenio Martinez). Scott Michael Morgan (Bernard Barker). Oscar Torre (Virgilio Gonzalez). Don DiPetta (Frank Sturgis). Kat Foster (Barbara Walters). Patrick Walker (Frank Wills). Chris Conner (John Ehrlichman). Nelson Franklin (Dick Moore). Patton Oswalt (Chuck Colson). Asha Kamali (Linda). Adam Ray (Ron Ziegler). Aleksandar Filimonovic (Zolton). Vincent Di Paolo (Vito). John Ventimiglia (John Sirica). Stephen Todt (Bob Woodward). Raphael Sbarge (Charles Shaffer). Erinn Hayes (Peggy Ebbitt). Brian Geraghty (Peter). Jeff Doucette (Sam Ervin).

Language English.

Producers Sam Esmail. Gina Fattore. Marisa Yeres Gill. Lisa Roberts Gillan. Amelia Gray. Chad Hamilton. Caroline James. Josh Levin. Sarah Matte. Leon Neyfakh. Rick Perlstein. Robbie Pickering. Daniel Rentas. Julia Roberts. Matt Ross. Gabriel Roth. Gregg Tilson.

Production Esmail Corp.. NBCUniversal Content Studios. Red Om Films.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status Finished (4)
